import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom.min' function Postcreation({post}) { let ex=true if(post[0]===false){ ex=false } return (ex &

{post.title}

{post.timeAndDate}

{post.body.length >=25? post.body.slice(0,25)+" . . ." :post.body}

) } export default Postcreation
